revised_title: Improvements in the Electrical Machine: Enhancing Excitation and Reducing Uncertainty
tldr: Dr. Nooth describes improvements to the electrical machine, focusing on enhancing excitation and reducing uncertainty. He suggests using non-conducting substances in front of the cushion and conducting substances behind it, as well as optimizing the use of amalgam and silk flaps. These improvements result in a more powerful and consistent electrical machine, regardless of weather conditions.
